content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Nesibe, thank you for considering my apartment. I believe that my property is in high demand and I am willing to negotiate with you in order to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. May I ask what your budget is for the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: 200 Euros per month. I would like to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I understand, Nesibe. However, I must inform you that my apartment is a prime location and I am looking to maximize my rent. I would be willing to negotiate with you, but I cannot guarantee that I will be able to meet your budget of 200 Euros per month. May I ask if you have any flexibility in your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I am willing to discuss and negotiate with you. Please let me know what you are looking for in terms of rental price.
